Brief Biography

I am a Ph.D. Candidate at the Department of Computer Science, Hong Kong Baptist University supervised by Dr. Jie Chen, co-supervised by Prof. Yike Guo and Prof. Jiming Liu. Before studying in HKBU, I worked as Senior Algorithm Engineer at Bigo, Guangzhou. Before that, I studied Software Engineering at Sun Yat-sen University and received the corresponding M.Eng. degree. I studied Computer Science and Technology at Xiamen University and received the corresponding B.Eng. degree.

News

  • - October, 2022: Glad that our mocap system didn't crash on InnoCarnival 2022 and HKBU Information day. Related coverage: HKBU showcases its art-tech, space and scientific endeavours at InnoCarnival [HKBU News]
  • - July, 2022: Our motion detection application worked successfully at HKBU annual concert. Related coverage: 浸大聯AI辦全球首個音樂會 指揮: AI 演繹有情感 [Yahoo News]
  • - June, 2022: Our 2 papers have been accepted by ACM MM 2022.
